section.heading: Procedures for reclaiming abandoned, accident, or recovered stolen vehicles that have been privately towed and stored.
section.text: An owner or lienholder, or person duly authorized by either, may reclaim an abandoned, accident, or recovered stolen vehicle that was towed by a private company and is stored on a private lot at any time before the expiration of the reclamation period by:

para.text: Appearing at the facility where the vehicle is located;
Paying the towing charges and storage fees to the tow company and reclaiming the vehicle; and
Furnishing proof of entitlement to possession of the vehicle.
